titleStmt.title: A relation of the great success the King of Portugal's army had upon the Spaniards, the 29th of May (Engl. stile) 1663
Relacion de la famosa ... vitoria de exercito de el Rey de Portugal ... alanço del exercito del Rey de Castilla ... en la provincia de Alem-Tejo en 8 de Junio de 1663. English
titleStmt.author: Vila Flor, Sancho Manuel de Vilhena, conde de, ca. 1607-1677.

titleStmt.title: A relation of the great success the King of Portugal's army had upon the Spaniards, the 29th of May (Engl. stile) 1663
Relacion de la famosa ... vitoria de exercito de el Rey de Portugal ... alanço del exercito del Rey de Castilla ... en la provincia de Alem-Tejo en 8 de Junio de 1663. English
titleStmt.author: Vila Flor, Sancho Manuel de Vilhena, conde de, ca. 1607-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Alice Warren, for William Garrett,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Villa Flor. cf. NUC Pre-1956.
Recounts Ville Flor's victory at Ameixial, near Estremox in 1663.

person.persName: Vila Flor, Sancho Manuel de Vilhena, conde de,
